name: Harmonic Dichotomy: Life and Its Paradoxes

metadata.name: Energy
metadata.description:
From the inside out, we are energy: embodying will and determination, calm and entropy; we are both light and darkness.

Energy is present in all things in existence, in what we can perceive and what we cannot.

Energy is a wave of possibilities, collapsing into reality before our very own eyes.

We are here, in this plane of existence, to experience, absorb, and return the energy that the universe has lent to us. We are here to understand and respect all forms of it.

We are here to love, laugh, and live through it all, because we are, fundamentally, all energy.
